scripts.security:semgrep: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/src" -w /src returntocorp/semgrep:latest semgrep scan --config p/ci --exclude node_modules --exclude .next --exclude dist --exclude build --exclude out --timeout 120 --max-target-bytes 2000000
scripts.security:all: pnpm security:audit && pnpm security:gitleaks && pnpm security:semgrep
scripts.hygiene:repo: pnpm -r lint && pnpm -r --filter web --filter api build
scripts.test:strict: pnpm run test:api && pnpm run test:web
scripts.hygiene:git: pnpm run hygiene:repo && pnpm run test:strict
